text: President Trump has ordered a step up in

has been named as safe oolo Saipa from

police said it seems likely he carried
out the attack in line with instructions
posted on social media by members of the
Islamic state group
Marla Bell reports a school bus lies in

dead and the suspect in custody one
student who moments earlier caught sight

then from there you could see the car

then continue down the street where it

moment everyone was just trying to
figure what was born on it all began

Halloween in New York a rented white

for many blocks fatally striking
cyclists and pedestrians the driver
abandoned the vehicle wildung fake guns
after hitting a school bus and was then

it was the definition of terrorism an

based on the investigation overnight it
